posts.title: Learning Vue.js 3
posts.body: I am learning Vue.js 3 with the composition API. It is great!

posts.title: Learning Vuex
posts.body: Vuex is a state management solution for Vue. It allows you to logically separate entities into modules.

posts.title: Routing with Vue Router
posts.body: I am creating a complex front-end app using Vue Router.

posts.title: Testing Vue Apps
posts.body: I am writing some tests for my application using Vue Test Utils. Testing is critical by often overlooked due to complexity or time constraints.
